pullRequest.title: Disable multi-module code coverage
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Disable multi-module coverage for modules with 'dot .'
Fixes
Approach

Describe how you are implementing the solutions along with the design details.

Samples

Provide high-level details about the samples related to this feature.

Remarks

List any other known issues, related PRs, TODO items, or any other notes related to the PR.

Check List

 Checked Tooling Support (#)

nodes.bodyText: What's the behavior if the module/file name contains "_"?

beforeCommit.message: Add Code coverage support for module names with a dot
